contentrichtext.text: '''''Play School''''' is an educational television programme for [[Preschool|pre-school]] aged children that is produced in many countries, including: *[[Play School (UK TV series)|''Play School'' (UK TV series)]] – the original BBC production *[[Play School (Australian TV series)|''Play School'' (Australian TV series)]] – an Australian Broadcasting Corporation production based on the British version *''[[Polka Dot Door]]'' – a Canadian adaptation of the ''Play School'' format *[[Play School (New Zealand TV series)|''Play School'' (New Zealand TV series)]] – New Zealand version based on the BBC original {{wiktionarypar|playschool}} '''Play school''' or '''playschool''' can also mean: *[[Kindergarten]] *[[Pre-school playgroup]] Not to be confused with [[Playskool]], a toy company. {{disambig}}
